column5: Don't know if this has been shown in here before, but fishing this way would save on all that expensive equipment we have.... Check it out, watch the whole video......  http://youtube.com/watch?v=fSOoaVkJFY8
ummmm... Lund guy.... if i drive over to your place, can i borrow YOUR arm to go fishing with?  those are some BIG fish too.

been around for years and years I think it was about 12 years ago I saw it on in-fisherman show.....you would have to be nuts to do that you wouldn't know  if it was a catfish or a snapping turtle you were grabbing till it was too late..and a 40lb cat could win the fight and you would be it's trophy

Yes its different all right i think its called noodling !!!!!.  ..and like terry said you wouldnt want to poke a huge snapper and have him take a few of your fingers off...cause they would thats for sure,i seen a video of a guy wrestling with one cat and it was over 100lbs...can you imagine,and the cat almost drown the guy and he didnt give up...crazy

"Noodling" is the term I've heard applied to it.  Here's the wikipedia entry.  They had that poor Mike Rowe guy doing it on the pilot of Dirty Jobs.  Fun to watch, but I wouldn't want my family trying it.
love the girls gone noodlin video on You Tube
